name: Record of Lodoss War Online
description: Lodoss War Online is a new 2D MMORPG, based on Record of Lodoss War—a legendary fantasy novel in Japan, set in the cursed land of Lodoss, which recounts the adventures and rise and fall of heroes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 3 800MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: intel(R) GMA 3150 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium 4 1.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9400GT 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
